description: She is the second I-Jin clone of Mata Hari that Yomiko met in the R.O.D OVA. At the end of the OVA, Nancy suffered extensive brain damage as a result of oxygen deprivation; the result was that her mental state was reduced to that of a child, with no memories of her earlier actions. Desperate to protect her, Yomiko took Nancy and ran off into hiding.
name: Nancy Makuhari
